title: Home And Away's Sam Frost pushes a doll around in a pram as she films scene with Tim Franklin
text:
Her character, Jasmine Delaney, has embarked on a romance with Summer Bay senior constable Colby Thorne, played by Tim Franklin.

And Home and Away actress Sam Frost appeared to be in her element on Monday as she filmed a romantic scene with Tim in Palm Beach, Sydney.

The 30-year-old was spotted pushing a pram containing a lifelike doll - a substitute for the characters' baby - while chatting with her handsome co-star.

Oh, baby! Home and Away's Sam Frost (left) pushed around a doll in a pram while filming a romantic scene with her on-screen lover Tim Franklin (right) in Palm Beach, Sydney on Monday

At one stage, the on-screen couple shared a tender embrace as they gazed into the horizon arm in arm.

Sam sported a billowing white blouse and showcased her trim pins in a pair of ripped denim shorts.

She styled her blonde hair loosely and completed her beachside ensemble with a pair of pink canvas sneakers.

Chilling: The pram contained a lifelike doll, which was a substitute for the characters' baby

So romantic! At one stage, the on-screen couple shared a tender embrace as they gazed into the horizon arm in arm

Breezy: Sam wore a billowing white blouse and showcased her trim pins in ripped denim shorts

Meanwhile, Tim dressed casually in a khaki T-shirt, cargo shorts and a pair of Adidas sneakers.

Jasmine's estranged husband Ryan 'Robbo' Shaw, played by Jake Ryan, was nowhere to be seen on set, which suggests their romance is now history.

Sam previously spoke out about how blessed she feels to be a part of the Home and Away family.

Gone with the wind: She styled her blonde hair loosely and completed her beachside ensemble with a pair of pink canvas sneakers

Keeping it simple: Meanwhile, Tim dressed casually in a khaki T-shirt, cargo shorts and a pair of Adidas sneakers

Speaking to TV Week, she said: 'I never in a million years could have imagined my career going the way that it has.

'To be a respected member of the cast has been amazing, and quite surreal.'

'I grew up watching these incredible careers as a child, so I certainly do pinch myself every single day,' she added.

Moving on: Jasmine's estranged husband Ryan 'Robbo' Shaw, played by Jake Ryan, was nowhere to be seen on set, which suggests their romance is now history
description: She's the Summer Bay beauty whose character Jasmine Delaney shares a steamy romance with policeman Colby Thorne, played by Tim Franklin.
authors: Monique Friedlander For Daily Mail Australia
